name: chunkundo.nvim
description: Neovim treats an entire insert session as one undo unit. This plugin breaks it into smaller chunks by time and word boundaries.

features.title: Time-based Chunking
features.description: Detects typing pauses (default 300ms) and splits undo blocks. Undo long edits incrementally.

features.title: Word-based Chunking
features.description: Splits on space, tab, enter, punctuation. Fine-grained undo at character level.

features.title: Auto-adjust
features.description: Learns your typing pattern and adjusts interval automatically. Gets better as you use it.

features.title: Statusline
features.description: u+5 (growing), u=12 (confirmed), etc. Real-time chunk status. Works with lualine.

features.title: chillout.nvim Integration
features.description: Uses debounce, throttle, and batch. This plugin is a showcase for chillout.nvim.
